cast.overview: Isolated bell-ringer Quasimodo wishes to leave Notre Dame tower against the wishes of Judge Claude Frollo, his stern guardian and Paris' strait-laced Minister of Justice. His first venture to the outside world finds him Esmeralda, a kind-hearted and fearless Romani woman who openly stands up to Frollo's tyranny.
cast.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame

details.biography: Mary Stout (born April 8, 1952) is an American actress and singer. In addition to numerous stage credits and guest roles in various television series, Stout is known as the singing voice of Laverne in Disney's The Hunchback of Notre Dame (1996) and for starring as radio station organist Eugenia Bremer on the AMC series Remember WENN (1996 - 1998).
details.name: Mary Stout
